title: Most popular crisps and savoury snack brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2013
summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Snack Brand, and Share of respondents currently purchasing in each Snack Brand on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents currently purchasing 42.0 is found at Snack Brand Walkers and the minimum is found at KP nuts where Snack Brand is 22.0.
There is a difference of 20.0 between the maximum Snack Brand Walkers and minimum Snack Brand KP nuts.
min_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Snack Brand, and Share of respondents currently purchasing in each Snack Brand on the y axis.
Snack Brand Walkers has the highest Share of respondents currently purchasing and KP nuts has the lowest Share of respondents currently purchasing.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Snack Brand, and Share of respondents currently purchasing in each Snack Brand on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents currently purchasing 42.0 is found at Snack Brand Walkers and the minimum is found at KP nuts where Snack Brand is 22.0.
There is a difference of 20.0 between the maximum Snack Brand Walkers and minimum Snack Brand KP nuts.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Snack Brand in the x axis and Share of respondents currently purchasing in the y axis.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is highest at Snack Brand Walkers and lowest at Snack Brand KP nuts.
Second maximum Share of respondents currently purchasing is found at Snack Brand Doritos.
The minimum Snack Brand KP nuts has got 1.91 times less Share of respondents currently purchasing than the maximum Snack Brand Walkers.
Snack Brand Walkers is higher than any other Snack Brands with value 42.0, followed by Doritos, and Pringles. Down to Snack Brand KP nuts with the lowest value 22.0.
Similar Share of respondents currently purchasing is found in Snack Brand Hula Hoops, and Pringles.
The Snack Brand Walkers tends to be 1.49 percent higher than average.
